title: Verify newly sign up pro is able to book shifts (ex. General Labor) and completes Training and Background check
custom_preconds:
** Note: Please skip liveness detection part of the testing for now. The feature is currently disabled on Production (not sure when this will be enabled again)


Pro has completed sign up

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on one of shifts in "Open shifts" screen for any of the auto-approved positions
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is redirected to shift details screen
Pro is redirected to "Unlock this and similar shifts by completing prerequisites" screen

custom_steps_separated.content: Complete the all steps as required
custom_steps_separated.expected:
If theres a quiz:

- Fail quiz Scenario: End of the quiz, it would display "you have scored below 80%. Pro can choose to re-take the quiz

- Re-take quiz scenario: After 1st attempt is failed should display re-take the quiz and then take the quiz again and answer correctly. Once passed, it would display the successfully passed screen

Pro is taking to watch a 1:41 mins video 

Once the video is completed, Pro is automatically taken to the "Complete these steps to book shift" screen

custom_steps_separated.content: On "Complete these steps to book shift" screen, tap "Review agreement" to scroll through all content until "I accept" button is enabled. Tap "I accept"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is redirected back to "Complete these steps to book shift" screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
Complete the following steps
- Accept the Contractor Services Agreement: Should have a green checkmark already
- Allow location access
- Enable motion activity access
- Add your home address
- Add your SSN
- Add your bank details
- Review cancellation policy
Under "Review Cancellation policy", tap "Review cancellation policy" button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is proceed to "Cancellation policy" screen

custom_steps_separated.content: Scroll to the bottom and tap "I understand and agree to the policy"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is redirected back to "Complete these steps to book shift" screen
Pro is redirected to "Accept these terms to book this shift"

custom_steps_separated.content:
**Note**: With "streamlined_booking_acceptance" exp enabled, the "Accept these terms to book this shift" step will be removed during booking

Pro proceed to accept the following terms
- I'll confirm 24 hrs before each shift or will be replaced
- I'll clock in to my shift in the app so I can get paid
- I understand that instawork has zero tolerance for no-shows
- I'll enable GPS location tracking 90 min before each shift or I'll be replaced
- I commit to upholding all the. other work requirements for this shift 

Tap "I accept"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is redirected to "Please complete the background check" with pre-populated Pro information

custom_steps_separated.content:
(Optional)
If pro was suspected of having duplicate account, he/she will be added (manually) to the "duplicate_detection_photo_update" experiment
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro should be asked to retake the profile photo with liveness detection feature as the last step to accept the following terms (in step 18) before tapping "I accept"

- I'll confirm 24 hrs before each shift or will be replaced
- I'll clock in to my shift in the app so I can get paid
- I understand that instawork has zero tolerance for no-shows
- I'll enable GPS location tracking 90 min before each shift or I'll be replaced
- I commit to upholding all the. other work requirements for this shift 
- I'll ensure my profile photo is up to date
Pro is redirected to Checkr UI for background check process

custom_steps_separated.content: Pro proceed to complete background check via Checkr UI and tap "Done" (after around 15 seconds on the screen)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is now on "Awesome, your shift is booked" with "Make your first impression count!" window pulled up from the bottom containing "Not Now" and "Show me tips" options"
